Package orego.play

Interface and classes from which players descend.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Playable
    Interface used by orego.ui.Orego to interact with a player (e.g., an orego.play.Player).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Player
    Chooses moves to play.
    PlayerTest  
    ThreadedPlayer
    A player that runs multiple threads.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnknownPropertyException
    Thrown when a command-line option tries to set an unknown property.
